articles.title: Stellantis, China's CATL to invest $4.33 bln in EV battery factory in Spain - Reuters
articles.description: Stellantis and Chinese battery maker CATL will invest 4.1 billion euros to build one of Europe's largest electric vehicle battery factories in Spain, encouraged by lower costs and government funding.

articles.title: Israel pounds Syrian army bases, denies deeper incursion - Reuters
articles.description: Israel pounded Syrian army bases on Tuesday in strikes it says aim to keep weapons from falling into hostile hands, but denied its forces had advanced into Syria beyond a buffer zone at the border.
